short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click AI to shorten the text on a web page by removing unnecessary words, meanwhile remaining the context and key points.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of wading through long articles? ShortenText.ai extension uses advanced AI to instantly summarize web pages. With a single click, it removes unnecessary words while preserving the core meaning and key takeaways, saving you valuable time.

Don't need to copy/paste text! Just click one button, and the text on a web page would be replaced by a shortened version.

You also will see the amount of words that were removed, and approximate time that was saved for you. Your time is priceless, so why you have to spend so much time reading meaningless words?
